Summary._: TRACK REPLACEMENT  Jul 9 - 12, Mon to Thu, beginning 830 PM each night [5] Service ends early between E 180 St, the Bronx and Bowling Green, Manhattan [2] [4] trains provide alternate service

Description._: TRACK REPLACEMENT  Jul 9 - 12, Mon to Thu, beginning 830 PM each night [5] Service ends early between E 180 St, the Bronx and Bowling Green, Manhattan [2] [4] trains provide alternate service

LongDescription:
TRACK REPLACEMENT | Jul 9 - 12, Mon to Thu, beginning 8:30 PM each night
[5] Service ends early between E 180 St, the Bronx and Bowling Green, Manhattan
[2] [4] trains provide alternate service


[5] service operates between Dyre Av and E 180 St.

Travel Alternatives
• Transfer between [5] and [2] trains at E 180 St.
• Transfer between [2] and [4] trains at 149 St-Grand Concourse.

Reminder: Late night [5] service operates as scheduled in the Bronx.

[ad] This service change affects one or more ADA accessible stations. Please call 511 for help with planning
your trip. If you are deaf or hard of hearing, use your preferred relay service provider or the free 711 relay.

Description._: TRACK REPLACEMENT  Until Jul 27, Mon to Fri, 6 AM to 10 AM and 3 PM to 10 PM [7D] Express trains make local stops in both directions at 33, 40, 46, 52, 69 and 74 Sts

TRACK REPLACEMENT | Until Jul 27, Mon to Fri, 6 AM to 10 AM and 3 PM to 10 PM
[7D] Express trains make local stops in both directions at 33, 40, 46, 52, 69 and 74 Sts


Rush hour [7D] express service runs between Mets-Willets Point and 74 St-Broadway

For Midtown Manhattan, consider [E] and [F] service via transfer at 74 St-Broadway/Roosevelt Av.

Summary._: ROCKAWAYS FLOOD PROTECTION  Until September 3, 2018 No [A] trains running to Far Rockaway-Mott Av No [S] Rockaway Park Shuttle service at Broad Channel

Description._: ROCKAWAYS FLOOD PROTECTION  Until September 3, 2018 No [A] trains running to Far Rockaway-Mott Av No [S] Rockaway Park Shuttle service at Broad Channel

LongDescription:
ROCKAWAYS: FLOOD PROTECTION | Until September 3, 2018
No [A] trains running to Far Rockaway-Mott Av
No [S] Rockaway Park Shuttle service at Broad Channel


[A] trains run between Inwood-207 St, Manhattan and Rockaway Park-Beach 116 St, Queens.

The [S] Rockaway Park Shuttle runs, approximately every 15 minutes, between Rockaway Park-Beach 116 St and Beach 90 St and via the [A] to/from Far Rockaway-Mott Av.

For Far Rockaway-Mott Av service, take the [S] instead, transfer at Beach 90 St.

For Broad Channel [S] shuttle customers, take the [A] instead.

[ad] For an accessible connection between the [A] train and [S] shuttle trains, transfer at Rockaway Park-Beach 116 St.

TRACK MAINTENANCE | Jul 9 - 12, Mon to Thu, beginning 8:30 PM each night
[B] Service ends early


Take the [A] [C] [D] and/or [Q] trains.

• Transfer at 59 St-Columbus Circle [A] [C] [D], 34 St-Herald Sq [D] [Q] and/or Atlantic Av-Barclays Ctr [D] [Q].

Reminder: [B] trains do not operate overnight.

Summary._: STATION ENHANCEMENTS   Jul 9 - 12,  Mon to Thu, 815 PM to 1130 PM [M] Service ends early between 71 Av, Queens and Essex St, Manhattan  [E] [F] [R] trains provide alternate service

Description._: STATION ENHANCEMENTS   Jul 9 - 12,  Mon to Thu, 815 PM to 1130 PM [M] Service ends early between 71 Av, Queens and Essex St, Manhattan  [E] [F] [R] trains provide alternate service

LongDescription:
STATION ENHANCEMENTS | Jul 9 - 12, Mon to Thu, 8:15 PM to 11:30 PM
[M] Service ends early between 71 Av, Queens and Essex St, Manhattan

[E] [F] [R] trains provide alternate service

[M] service operates between Essex St and Metropolitan Av.

Travel Alternatives:
[R] trains make all [M] stops between 71 Av and Queens Plaza.
[E] trains make all [M] stops between Queens Plaza and 5 Av/53 St.
[F] trains make all [M] stops between 47-50 Sts and Delancey St/Essex St.

• Transfer between [F] and [R] trains at Roosevelt Av or 34 St-Herald Sq.
• Transfer between [E] and [F] trains at W 4 St.
• Transfer between [F] and [M] trains at Delancey St/Essex St.

Note: Brooklyn-bound [F] trains make all [M] stops from Queens Plaza to 5 Av/53 St after 9:45 PM, Mon to Fri.

Please use the following guide to arrive at your station before end of service.

To 71 Av: To Metropolitan Av:
Metropolitan Av8:33 PM 71 Av8:23 PM
Myrtle Av8:45 PMRoosevelt Av8:33 PM
Essex St8:58 PMQueens Plaza8:43 PM
W 4 St9:07 PM47-50 Sts8:52 PM
47-50 Sts9:15 PMB'way-Lafayette St9:02 PM

Reminder: Late night [M] service operates between Metropolitan Av and Myrtle Av.
